## DialogMetadataSelectorComponentData interface

Data that are passed to component that handles metadata

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DialogMetadataSelectorComponentData<TMetadata> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cssClasses](./grid-material.dialogmetadataselectorcomponentdata.cssclasses.md) | <code>Object</code> | Css classes passed to dialog component |
|  [metadata](./grid-material.dialogmetadataselectorcomponentdata.metadata.md) | <code>TMetadata</code> | Method that is used for setting metadata into component |
|  [texts](./grid-material.dialogmetadataselectorcomponentdata.texts.md) | <code>Object</code> | Texts passed to dialog component |

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
